Service Pages

Each service offered on your Google Business Profile should have its own dedicated page on your website. This reinforces relevance, improves local SEO, and helps Google match your business to specific searches in your area.

Checklist for Each Service Page

  • Create one page per Google Business Profile service
  • Use H1 for the main service name and H2 for sub-services or benefits
  • Include your city, region, or service area naturally in the content
  • Ensure content is unique and provides value for users
  • Link these service pages from your homepage and main navigation

Optional: Draft page titles and meta descriptions for each service page to enhance SEO.

Examples of optimized service page setup:

  • URL: /plumber-charleston
    Title: Plumber in Charleston, SC | Reliable Plumbing Services
    Meta Description: Expert plumbing services in Charleston. Fast, reliable, and fully licensed. Call today for a free quote.

  • URL: /emergency-plumbing-charleston
    Title: Emergency Plumbing in Charleston, SC | 24/7 Services
    Meta Description: Need an emergency plumber in Charleston? Weâ€™re available 24/7 to fix leaks, clogs, and other urgent issues.

  • URL: /drain-cleaning-charleston
    Title: Drain Cleaning Services in Charleston | Fast & Affordable
    Meta Description: Keep your drains clear with professional drain cleaning in Charleston. Affordable rates, reliable service.
